title: Add Copy Raw button to AI console for full output including base64
description: Add a second "Copy Raw" button to the AI console that copies all raw output including base64 encoded data. Keep the existing formatted copy button for readable output. Users can choose which version they want.

title: Add Copy Raw button with full unformatted output to AIProgressPanel
AI Thinking Overlay - Show intermediate images with pulsing effect during iterations
description: When the AI is in reference mode and iterating through candidate images, show each intermediate result as a semi-transparent pulsing overlay on the canvas. This gives users visual feedback that the AI is "thinking" and lets them see the spatial alignment of generated content. The pulsing animation makes it unmistakably "work in progress".

title: Add thinking image state to AIProgressContext
Create ThinkingOverlay component with pulsing animation
Integrate ThinkingOverlay into canvas and wire up iteration images
Fix ThinkingOverlay bugs and add Apple Intelligence-style gradient border
description: Fix issues with the ThinkingOverlay: 1) Border never pulsed, 2) "AI Thinking" label stayed after completion. Replace with Apple Intelligence-style animated rainbow/prismatic gradient border that rotates around the canvas edge.

title: Fix ThinkingOverlay - replace with Apple Intelligence gradient border animation
Fix ThinkingOverlay - remove white background, fix status clearing
description: Issues: 1) White rectangle covering canvas - the ::before pseudo-element has background: #fafafa blocking the view. Should be transparent. 2) Border stayed glowing after completion - thinkingStatus not clearing when AI process ends. 3) Glow scope wrong - should start on command execution and end when ENTIRE process completes, not per-iteration.

title: Add interim image overlay and shimmer particles to ThinkingOverlay
description: 1) Restore semi-transparent interim images showing on top of canvas during AI iterations. 2) Add subtle animated shimmer/sparkle particles floating across the canvas surface for magical effect.
